profile.name: Aditya Adam Firdaus
profile.shortdesc: A data-driven professional specializing in analytics, predictive modeling, and AI deployment to enhance business insights.
profile.desc:
I am a Bachelor of Statistics with a strong interest in Data Analysis, Data Science, Machine Learning, and Artificial Intelligence (AI).

Currently, I work as a Data Analyst for a client in the real estate sector. My role includes:

  1. 1. Preparing, cleaning, and analyzing data using Python or BigQuery, visualizing insights with Looker Studio, and delivering compelling data storytelling.
  2. 2. Automating ETL processes using Python (FastAPI).
  3. 3. Developing AI models and chatbots.

In my daily work, I primarily use Python as my main programming language. For database management, I work with MySQL, SQLite, Firebase, and BigQuery. For data visualization, I utilize Looker Studio and Google Spreadsheet. I am open to new job opportunities and excited to explore roles that align with my expertise.
